settings.title: âš™ï¸ Settings
settings.privacy_policy_content:
Privacy Policy for Lucky Goblin

Last Updated: December 26, 2025

This Privacy Policy describes how Lazycat ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our mobile game "Lucky Goblin" (the "Game").

1. Information We Collect
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.

2. How We Use Your Information
We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

3. Information Sharing
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent.

4. Data Security
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.

5. Your Rights
You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time.

6. Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at dxycj250@gmail.com.
settings.contact_us_content:
We'd love to hear from you!

If you have any questions, feedback, or need support, please reach out to us via email.

redeem_code.title: Redeem Code
redeem_code.error_already_used: This code has already been used

game_tutorial.step1_description: All symbols you choose will appear here.
game_tutorial.step2_description: Symbols here may appear in the mines. Dig them out to trigger their effects!
game_tutorial.step3_description: This shows your current coins, level, and the coin goal for the current level.
game_tutorial.step4_description: Now start your first dice roll!

difficulty.select_hint: Choose a challenge difficulty that suits you

game.first_round_hint: Choose a symbol to add to your symbol pool
game.symbol_hint: Choose a symbol to add to your symbol pool
game.no_logs:
No settlement logs yet
Logs will appear after rolling dice

goblin.swipe_hint: Swipe left/right to view different goblins

game_over.title: ğŸ˜¢ Game Over
game_over.victory_message: Congratulations! You successfully completed all 30 rounds!
game_over.insufficient_coins_message: Insufficient coins! Cannot reach the goal of {amount} coins.
game_over.death_blessing_ended: Death's blessing has ended. Game forced to end.

confirmations.exit_message: Are you sure you want to exit the current game and return to the home screen?

page1.title: Welcome to the Goblin World
page1.content: Long ago, the various civilized forces in the world had been entangled in conflicts for hundreds of years, never ceasing.

page2.title: Mine and Collect
page2.content: But one day, an alien civilization invaded this world. They ruthlessly wiped out the civilizations that had existed for thousands of years, leaving nothing behind.

page3.title: Survive and Thrive
page3.content: All races were also turned into symbols by alien rays and buried deep underground.

page4.title: Bonds and Synergies
page4.content: After the war, the goblins living in the caves escaped the disaster. By the time they realized what had happened, they were the only remaining race in the world.

page5.title: Begin Your Journey
page5.content: All hope rests on the goblins. They have decided to dig up all the symbols from underground to save the living beings and gain more gold coins to rebuild civilization.

step1.title: Start Game
step1.description: Click here to take control of the goblins for digging expeditionsâ€”unearth more symbols, form more bonds, and earn more gold coins!

step2.title: Explore the Shop
step2.description: Click here to browse the diverse array of goods. You can get plenty of useful items for your digging endeavors!

step3.title: 7-Day sign-in
step3.description: Click here to log in and check in daily. A huge number of rewards will be given to you for free!

sign_in.title: 7-Day Sign In
sign_in.subtitle: Sign in daily to claim amazing rewards!

hint.signed: Come back tomorrow for more rewards!

warrior_goblin.name: Warrior Goblin
warrior_goblin.description: Own a classic six-sided die that can roll numbers from <color=#B9625F>1</color> to <color=#B9625F>6</color>.

craftsman_goblin.name: Craftsman Goblin
craftsman_goblin.description: He modified the dice into powerful 8-sided dice that could roll numbers from <color=#B9625F>1</color> to <color=#B9625F>8</color>.

gambler_goblin.name: Gambler Goblin
gambler_goblin.description: He's a complete gambling addict, only able to roll <color=#B9625F>1</color> or <color=#B9625F>6</color>.

king_goblin.name: King Goblin
king_goblin.description: The eccentric king, who only likes odd numbers, can roll a <color=#B9625F>1</color>, <color=#B9625F>3</color>, <color=#B9625F>5</color>, <color=#B9625F>7</color>, or <color=#B9625F>9</color>.

wizard_goblin.name: Wizard Goblin
wizard_goblin.description: He believes even number saves the world. Can roll a <color=#B9625F>2</color>, <color=#B9625F>4</color>, <color=#B9625F>6</color>, <color=#B9625F>8</color>, <color=#B9625F>10</color>.

athlete_goblin.name: Athlete Goblin
athlete_goblin.description: An athlete who pushes the limits. Capable of throwing scores of <color=#B9625F>0</color>, <color=#B9625F>1</color>, <color=#B9625F>2</color>, <color=#B9625F>6</color>, <color=#B9625F>7</color>, or <color=#B9625F>8</color>.

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.description: Remove the symbol with the highest rarity among all <color=#E74875>#Materials</color>, and gain 20 gold coins

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: For each <color=#E74875>#Alien</color> symbol in the symbol pool, lose 5 gold coins; for each <color=#E74875>#Monster</color> symbol, gain 20 gold coins

village_chief.name: Village Chief
village_chief.description: Obtain 2 random <color=#E74875>#Human</color> symbols and gain 5 gold coins

forest_fairy.name: Forest Sprite
forest_fairy.description: Remove all <color=#147ED9>Dark Moon Sprites</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per sprite eliminated

dark_moon_fairy.name: Dark Moon Sprite
dark_moon_fairy.description: Remove all <color=#147ED9>Starlight Sprites</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per sprite eliminated

starlight_fairy.name: Starlight Sprite
starlight_fairy.description: Remove all <color=#147ED9>Forest Sprites</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per sprite eliminated

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.description: Obtain 3 random <color=#E74875>#Human</color> symbols. Remove all <color=#E74875>#Monsters</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per monster eliminated

ancient_tree_elder.name: Ancient Tree Elder
ancient_tree_elder.description: Add 1 <color=#080909>Earth Elemental</color> to the symbol pool

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: Obtain 2 <color=#E74875>#Tools</color> symbols that you do not currently own

princess.name: Princess
princess.description: If there are 5 different <color=#E74875>#Humans</color> symbols in the symbol pool, obtain 1 <color=#AA2ABB>Paladin</color>

vampire.name: Vampire
vampire.description: Eliminate 5 <color=#E74875>#Humans</color> from the symbol pool to get 3 random <color=#E74875>#Material</color> symbols.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Eliminate <color=#AA2ABB>Vampires</color> in the symbol pool and yourself, gain 2 random <color=#E74875>#Equipment</color> symbols.

female_ninja.name: Female Ninja
female_ninja.description: Never appears in the mine. If there is a <color=#080909>Male Ninja</color> in the symbol pool, eliminate all <color=#147ED9>Zombies</color> from the symbol pool.

male_ninja.name: Male Ninja
male_ninja.description: Never appears in the mine. If there is a <color=#080909>Female Ninja</color> in the symbol pool, eliminate all <color=#147ED9>Zombies</color> from the symbol pool at the start of each round.

god_of_strength.name: God of Strength
god_of_strength.description: +50 gold coins for the next gold gain. Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).

god_of_speed.name: God of Speed
god_of_speed.description: Gain an extra chance to select symbols. Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).

god_of_harvest.name: God of Harvest
god_of_harvest.description: Settle the next gold gain twice (double the profit). Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).

god_of_luck.name: God of Luck
god_of_luck.description: Get an extra dice to use for the next roll (temporary +1 dice). Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).

death.name: God of Death
death.description: Eliminate half the number of symbols in the symbol pool.

water_element.name: Water Elemental
water_element.description: Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Water Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.

fire_element.name: Fire Elemental
fire_element.description: Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Fire Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.

thunder_element.name: Thunder Elemental
thunder_element.description: Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Thunder Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.

ice_element.name: Ice Elemental
ice_element.description: Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Ice Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.

earth_element.name: Earth Elemental
earth_element.description: Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Earth Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.

rock.name: Stone
rock.description: If there are <color=#E74875>#Tools</color> symbols in the symbol pool, remove yourself from the symbol pool and get 2 random <color=#E74875>#Materials</color> symbols.

book_of_the_dead.name: Book of the Dead
book_of_the_dead.description: Remove yourself and 1 <color=#080909>Cross</color> from the symbol pool, and generate a <color=#AA2ABB>God of Death</color> into the symbol pool.

hypnosis_pendulum.name: Hypnotic Pendulum
hypnosis_pendulum.description: Remove yourself from the symbol pool and randomly generate one of <color=#147ED9>Princess</color>, <color=#080909>Female Ninja</color> or <color=#080909>Nun</color> into the symbol pool.

dragon_fire_gun.name: Dragon Firearm
dragon_fire_gun.description: Remove itself and eliminate a random <color=#AA2ABB>#Monster</color> from the symbol pool, gain 10 coins.

contract_scroll.name: Contract Scroll
contract_scroll.description: Remove yourself from the symbol pool and randomly generate one of <color=#147ED9>Forest Fairy</color>, <color=#147ED9>Dark Moon Fairy</color> or <color=#147ED9>Starlight Fairy</color> into the symbol pool.

shuriken.name: Shuriken
shuriken.description: If there are <color=#080909>Female Ninja</color> or <color=#080909>Male Ninja</color> in the symbol pool, get an extra 30 gold coins.

diary.name: Diary
diary.description: Remove yourself from the symbol pool and generate a <color=#AA2ABB>Vampire</color> into the symbol pool.

magatama.name: Magatama
magatama.description: Increase the base value of all future <color=#080909>Common Symbols</color> by 1.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Remove itself and gain 1 <color=#147ED9>Spaceship</color> to the symbol pool.

coin.name: Coin
coin.description: Eliminate yourself and get 2 random <color=#E74875>Materials</color> symbols.

talisman_paper.name: Talisman Paper
talisman_paper.description: Eliminate the <color=#080909>Werewolf</color> and yourself to get 100 gold coins.

iron_key.name: Iron Key
iron_key.description: Eliminate 1 <color=#080909>Iron Chest</color> from the symbol pool to get 50 gold coins.

silver_key.name: Silver Key
silver_key.description: Eliminate 1 <color=#147ED9>Silver Chest</color> from the symbol pool to get 100 gold coins.

master_key.name: Master Key
master_key.description: Eliminate a higher-level chest from the symbol pool (prioritize <color=#147ED9>Silver Chest</color>) to get double the gold coins of the chest.

flower_fairy.name: Flower Spirit
flower_fairy.description: Eliminate 3 <color=#080909>Flower Spirits</color> from the symbol pool to get 1 <color=#147ED9>Forest Fairy</color>.

werewolf.name: Werewolf
werewolf.description: Eliminate 2 <color=#E74875>#Humans</color> from the symbol pool to get 3 random <color=#E74875>#Tool</color> symbols.

one_eyed_monster.name: Cyclops
one_eyed_monster.description: Get 30 gold coins when dug up for the first time, 20 gold coins for the second time, decreasing by 10 each time until it reaches 0.

gomorrah.name: Gomora
gomorrah.description: Randomly eliminate 1 symbol other than itself from the symbol pool to get 50 gold coins.

mind_controller.name: Mind Controller
mind_controller.description: Randomly transform 1 symbol in the symbol pool into a <color=#E74875>#Monster</color> symbol.

meteorite.name: Meteorite
meteorite.description: If there is a <color=#AA2ABB>Gomora</color> in the symbol pool, eliminate the <color=#AA2ABB>Gomora</color> from the symbol pool to get 30 gold coins.

dice.name: Dice
dice.description: Permanently increase the number of <color=#AA2ABB>Dice</color> by 1. Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up.

magic_bag.name: Magic Bag
magic_bag.description: Remove itself and randomly generate 3~5 random symbols into the symbol pool.

child_merchant_bond.name: Child & Merchant Bond
child_merchant_bond.description: When you have both Child and Merchant symbols, gain +5 coins per turn

merchant_trading_bond.name: Shrewd Merchant
merchant_trading_bond.description: Symbols eliminated by Merchant gain coins equal to 2 times their base value

vampire_curse_bond.name: Vampire's Curse
vampire_curse_bond.description: If Vampire and Tie exist simultaneously in symbol pool, lose 50 coins at the start of each turn (triggers at round start)

death_blessing_bond.name: Death's Blessing
death_blessing_bond.description: Gain 200 coins for the next 5 turns, but the game will forcefully end after 5 turns

wolf_hunter_bond.name: Wolf Hunters
wolf_hunter_bond.description: If Werewolf and Axe exist simultaneously in symbol pool, lose 20 coins each turn

element_master_bond.name: Element Master
element_master_bond.description: If symbol pool has all five elements, gain 100 coins each turn

justice_bond.name: Justice Prevails
justice_bond.description: If Cross and Nun exist simultaneously in symbol pool, gain a Dragon Firearm (if not owned)

apocalypse_bond.name: Apocalypse
apocalypse_bond.description: If Gomorrah, Zombie, Werewolf, and Vampire exist simultaneously in symbol pool, randomly eliminate half of symbols at the start of next turn and gain 500 coins

human_extinction_bond.name: Human Extinction
human_extinction_bond.description: If Ray Gun, Alien Helmet, Spaceship, and Mind Controller exist simultaneously in symbol pool, eliminate 5 humans at the start of next turn and gain 100 coins

raccoon_city_bond.name: raccoon-city
raccoon_city_bond.description: Infect one human into a zombie before each mining. Gain +20 coins for each <color=#147ED9>Zombie</color> mined

human_10_bond.name: human-10
human_10_bond.description: +5 coins per <color=#080909>Human</color> in pool each round.

material_2_bond.name: material-2
material_2_bond.description: Each round auto-fuse 2 normal materials into 1 rare.

material_4_bond.name: material-4
material_4_bond.description: Each round auto-fuse 2 rare materials into 1 epic.

tools_2_bond.name: tools-2
tools_2_bond.description: If any die shows 1, gain an extra roll.

tools_4_bond.name: tools-4
tools_4_bond.description: If any die shows 6, auto-mine all unopened tiles.

classictale_2_bond.name: classictale-2
classictale_2_bond.description: Mark a random tile as special; its earnings are doubled.

classictale_6_bond.name: classictale-6
classictale_6_bond.description: Mining the center tile grants +100 coins.
